content.text:
# movies/music/games for sick days

I've been fighting off a cold since Friday, but I'm still feeling crappy (?!) so I'll be spending my Monday morning at home. Any suggestions on how to pass the time and fight the urge to go to work anyway? I know I should rest, but I can't think of anything to do. My buddy [@Bram](@eWOvcKppzZfzr04jpftrvwOUCzF847PQZ942hI3FCsI=.ed25519) saw [Free State of Jones](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Free_State_of_Jones_(film)) last night and recommended it to me, plus I just bought Skyrim on sale for $20, but I'd love some more recommendations on things to do once I'm done with those.

Thanks all. :heart:
